import '../static/css/Home.css' import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import CardCurso from '../components/CardCurso' import CardProjeto from '../components/CardProjeto' import axios from 'axios' class Home extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { titulo: '' } } getCursos(){ axios.get('http://localhost:4000/cursos').then(function (res) { this.setState({ titulo: res }) }); } render() { return (
